column2: A Jewish preacher has arrived in our realm and has requested an audience.
We do not need his foul religion, lock him in a cage.

The preacher bows before you and shows you the respect befitting your title as Khan. He states he has come to shine God's light on our people but is careful to state that seeing God in all His glory will not change how I rule and it may sway some of our Christian neighbours. Perhaps he has a point?
This was a waste of time, lock him up.
